title: 感觉论坛升级太困难了
author: 梦~
txt_content: Rt 不水贴升到6级太困难了- -

replies.author: 恶魔-潇洒
replies.txt_content:
呵呵，高质量回复，高质量发帖很容易
比如我就是靠写小说骗分升到现在的~

replies.author: qwe1004645285
replies.txt_content: 没错，好升到7级更加苦难啊

replies.author: ljy2014
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Leng_Mou
replies.txt_content: 觉得困难就在这里水么？【笑

replies.author: Mc李琦
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Saralion
replies.txt_content: 你造就好

replies.author: 三十八阿哥
replies.txt_content: 于怒水

replies.author: Raymond_Min
replies.txt_content: 水贴是不对了 别以为这样就可以快速升级

replies.author: minehenry
replies.txt_content: 6级很简单 赶到困难多半是心里作用

replies.author: wocaocaocaocao
replies.txt_content: 只要成为一个水神,升级什么的都是渣渣,就比如Leng_Mou这个大水神

replies.author: undefined
replies.txt_content: 7-8级是个坎

replies.author: zjy950316
replies.txt_content: 那你还水

replies.author: 梦~
replies.txt_content: 终于快6级了 再加把劲

replies.author: 黒叔叔
replies.txt_content: 所以矿工茶馆是一个好地方！
去问答版

replies.author: Saojiewud
replies.txt_content: 花样水就好

replies.author: yezixm
replies.txt_content: 只要成为一个水神,升级什么的都是渣渣

replies.author: 普通HIM
replies.txt_content:
我已经7级了
要想在200天以内升到7级就必须日水一百

replies.author: 宝藏猎人
replies.txt_content: 楼主你都要6了竟然还说这种话

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content:
狂回复就行了
水贴很危险的

replies.author: 山大王
replies.txt_content: 这么努力水六级，发宣传帖吧？！

replies.author: gopnik
replies.txt_content: 你就差这十几分了，怎么个难法

replies.author: niubixiaor
replies.txt_content: 所以你就机智的水了一贴
